text: (obage saturan obava vinasa kara damana avasthava balaporottuven sitima nisa) visvasavantayin siyallanma (tamange ratagama athæra) pitamam vi yama kisima avasthavaka sudusu næta. dharma karanavan dæna gænimata (adahas kalahot e venuven) ovungen sæma samuhayakinma samaharek pamanak pitatva giyahot madida? (ovun dharma karanavan igena gena) tamange daruvan veta apasu hæri pæmina ovunta (taman igena gat dæya pavasa) biya ganva anaturu angavannaha. (game sitinavun) pravesamen sita (tama janatava araksa kara) gannaha
